properties.Name: Silver Lake
properties.Description: Swim in the summer and snowshoe across in the winter

properties.Name: Bristol Falls
properties.Description: Great swimming hole with places to jump off rocks and climb behind a waterfall

properties.name: Forest City Trail Buckets
properties.Description: Great spot to stop in after hiking Camel's Hump. Park at the Forest City Parking area. Up and down river from this point, there are multiple swimming holes. Start at the Forest City Trail and cross over the bridge at about .4 miles. You'll find numerous good swimming and dunking holes on the left.

properties.name: Bolton potholes
properties.description: 5 waterfalls that each create their own pool of water. The last one also has a rocky beach. As one of the closest swimming holes to Burlington, it can be very popular on warm summer days. Head upstream to get away from the crowds.

properties.name: Lareau park
properties.description: This swimming hole offers a little something for everyone. Shallow waters near the shore are great for little ones learning how to tread water, while directly across the river, rocks provide a seven-foot-tall platform to leap into a 12-foot-deep water for the older, bolder crowd.  Bring a picnic and a blanket--it also boasts a sandy bank, grass picnic area, parking and toilet facilities. Or stop by American Flatbread for dinner afterwards. It's located just down the road.

properties.Name: Lake Pleiad
properties.Description: Half way up the Snow Bowl and accessible from the Long Trail, this is a beautiful (cold) remote lake! If you bring a paddle, a brave soul hiked his canoe up the mountain for the enjoyment of all

properties.Name: Falls of Lana
properties.Description: This beautiful waterfall is a short hike from the Silver Lake trail head. A great place for cliff jumping!
Bring a soccer ball, a six pack, and your swim suits! Often packed on sunny Saturdays, the Lake Dunmore beach is only 20 minutes drive from Middlebury
properties.Name: Lake Dunmore Beach
Silver Lake
properties.Description: Hike about 1.2 miles from the Silver Lake trailhead, this is a beautiful lake with a stunning view

properties.Name: Dorset Quarry
properties.Description: A private quarry open to the public, with clear and cold water and great cliffs for jumping
